abstract: The most notable way in which Tim Cook, Apple's new chief executive, diverged from Steve Jobs was in leaving all of the demonstrations of new technologies to his lieutenants.
snippet: The most notable way in which Tim Cook, Apple's new chief executive, diverged from Steve Jobs was in leaving all of the demonstrations of new technologies to his lieutenants.
lead_paragraph: For people who are curious about how Apple's new chief executive, Tim Cook, will compare to the company's previous C.E.O., Steve Jobs, there's not a lot to go on yet.
